name: PlusNumberGame
0:
”Alexa, open Plus Number Game”
”Alexa, start Plus Number Game”
”Alexa, launch Plus Number Game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: plus number game
des:
You can use "Plus Number Game" to check your ability, you just need to say "Alexa, launch Plus Number Game"

Alexa first asks which difficulty mode you want to play. You just need to say "A" or "B"
"A" is for Easy Mode
"B" is for Hard Mode

Then Alexa only gives you two number and you have to add that number.

Can you answer quickly and score 10 out of 10?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
